WAY WAY WAY too many perks. There's also like, 6 different types of in-game currency. This game isn't really that fun unless youre the killer. Also it's not that fun if you're a survivor. Just not a great game.
игра прикольная, но разрабы убивают игру, прошу игру фиксить, а не добавлять скины

Игра понятна своим смыслом,
4 выживших 1 маньяк. Выжившие должны починить генератор или если остался один попасть в люк, маньяк должен предотвратить побег выживших. Игра интересна своими обновлениеми и большим выбором персонажей.
И быстро не наскучит. Если только ты так и не научился играть т.к в игре нужно понимать у кого какие навыки что бы находить нужный подход к тому или иному персонажу, именно этим интересна игра.
Само сабой комментарий положительный и разработчики сделали огромный вклад в игру.
Дальше будет ещё интереснее.
Удачи каждому пользователю с недавным приобретением игры.
This game is very fun. The game is kinda like Friday the 13th: The game. It involves a lot of chasing. For maximum fun make sure you have a friend group to play together, trying to escape the killer.

There is no better present than a Tatar wife! "

 How I hate, urban!  Every season they climb from the city to our area!
 Why did our collective farm chairman open this fucking hostel?
 The other day, behold, four city thugs rushed into my garden, and let's destroy everything.  Tolley drunk, roofing felts are high on something, it's not clear to me, but they run around, brawl and rumble with my tools, which is foolishness.  Imagine they think they are playing!  And me, what a joke for them?

 Once, one rowdy was so disgraceful that he foolishly fell into my bear trap.  I think that's what he needs!  I, of course, took pity and decided to help him, but he is a wretch, as soon as I approached, he dropped the boards from the stack on my feet, and even blinded me with a flashlight that I almost lost my sight!  And he screams, rushes from side to side, twirls round dances near the cobblestone, and then, like a burdock of some kind, will run into the toilet and sit satisfied, looking at me from the window.  I didn’t even bother to approach, suddenly he’s sick and bites me, then I’ll have to be treated.  Here's how to talk to them normally after that?  Some swear words come to mind as soon as I see them!

 Don't think I'm a good person, but, you know, I once noticed how these obscurantists dig in my old generators, and twist something there.  At the beginning I thought that they, as Timurovites, wanted to help, and then I realized that they were probably taking them apart for non-ferrous metal in order to buy an extra check for themselves.  Well, here's how to treat them normally after that?  I kind of don't care about the generators, they are already there for a hundred years and no one needs them for a long time, and it’s dangerous to approach them, they can be shocked.  But, you know, how insulting it is for such people to do at least some service.  Better if they rust in my rain than these idols will hand over them to scrap, and then they will buy a hawthorn and wander drunk in our village and prevent everyone from sleeping peacefully!  How can I then look into the eyes of my neighbors, huh?

 I have endured these boobies for a long time, devil take them!  But here, by the way, I live!  This is my house and in my yard I won't allow this anymore!  I'm tired of running after everyone and asking politely to leave, because I want an ordinary rest, and not this constant fuss.  From that day on, I will catch them and hang them on fish hooks, so that they can hang and gather their minds, or at least just think about their behavior, otherwise they will inadvertently harm themselves, and I will be guilty.  In our village, near Chernobyl, the fish is good, so fishing tackle made of solid steel will withstand any city idiot!  And especially violent I will give out slaps in the face, so that they understand that it is not good to do this!  They will not understand otherwise!  Right?

game is fun besides high level killers. if you play spirit or doctor you deserve crucifixion.

Um jogo que adoro tanto pra jogar solo, quanto multiplayer; gosto do desafio e a tensão que o jogo proporciona, e das possibilidades de experimentar as habilidades que cada um dos personagens (tanto sobreviventes quanto assassinos) fornecem. Sugiro comprar em promoção, já que ele está constantemente em sale (tanto o jogo base, quanto as DLCs).
E aliás, já tomei cada susto com esse jogo, que tenho certeza que perdi uns dois anos de vida nisso. :v

Это гг пацаны, всем советую - до 10.02.2021 

Не рекомендую никому покупать - разрабы красавы, похоронили проект - 10.02.2021
It may be tough in the beginning and toxic later on but the game is addictive, bullshit at times, but addictive. 10/10

Tengo que confesar que este juego únicamente me lo compre por el contenido del dlc de silent hill. Como fan de la saga, no pude evitar poder encarnar de nuevo tanto a la valiente Heather Mason como al despiadado Pyramid Head. No esperaba gran cosa del juego mas alla de vivir esa experiencia, pero he de decir que me encontré ante un multijugador muy entretenido con una mecánica que aunque puede parecer bastante sencilla, tiene su complejidad, y ya seas superviviente o asesino, tienes diferentes builds y estrategias que puedes escoger según tu estilo de juego.

Lo peor de todo como en muchos juegos multijugador es el mal matchmaking que tiene este juego. Si ya le unes que el juego tiene sus años y tiene una base de jugadores bastante asentada, empezar de 0 puede ser un tanto frustrante. Yo por lo tanto recomiendo pasar de los rangos y pasar completamente de los jugadores tóxicos que pululan por el juego, con tal de pasarlo bien y ahorrarse el que no te salga alguna ulcera que otra.
Потрясающе, шикарно, поразительно, фантастически, просто ВАУ, нет слов! kekw

Very fun, asymmetric horror game. As you grow more experienced, it becomes less scary and more about tactics to survive with/kill your friends or randoms. Highly recommend to any horror fan or anyone who enjoys chase sequences; you'll be in 'em a lot.
Сначала тебе все кажется классным и интересным , а потом ты находишь матч , и ман тебя хитует за километр
So long as you don't camp tis a grand Game!

C'est un jeu que je recommande vraiment!
Il y a un bon gameplay, beaucoup de survivants/tueurs à débloquer, on peut jouer avec des amis...
Je pourrai jouer des heures je ne m'en lasserai pas! De plus, les développeurs ajoute très régulièrement du contenu.
Bref, je vous le recommande!

Originally, my review was from a time where I was having a lot of fun with the game and at a point where the game wasn't getting screwed over with stupid new mechanics (such as the boon totems) and horrible business practices with the NFTs.

Since that first review, the game has just gotten worse. MMR has screwed over the game's fun with a huge influx of hackers at high MMR not even providing a reasonable reward for annoying survivors running the same 4 perks, abusing poorly made tiles and getting on a high horse for winning the game. BHVR has gotten into NFTs and I don't see this game surviving past 2021 on steam because of their NFT policy. The addition of boon totems has severely damaged the killer experience, especially with the new totem just providing a teamwide unbreakable.

They've since nerfed and gutted killers that didn't need nerfing and gutting (i.e. Deathslinger) because people who are not as good with the game whined and complained enough for one of the most fun and interesting killers to be turned from a B-tier killer with great 1v1 and horrible map pressure to be turned into a C- tier killer with worse 1v1 and still no map control to compensate.

Fix the game and stop listening to the wrong sides of the community.
Me gusta el juego porque si xd moment
one of the best horror based, asymmetrical pvp games you could find on the market.
Picked up this game to play with some friends. I didn't realize how cathartic it is to have a chance to run around killing your friends is every once in a while.
Extremamente divertido. Quanto mais você joga, mais quer jogar. E olha que eu nao curtia o jogo no começo.
Fun, but aggravating at times. Definitely better with friends in my opinion, but still good on your own. 15/10 would recommend.

Очень атмосферная и страшная игра!

В действительности, когда бежишь от маньяка кровь в венах начинает стынуть! Огромный выбор маньяков, причём у каждого из них уникальные спелы (перки). Самое главное, что обычно в подобных играх всегда интересно играть исключительно за антагониста, но в данном творении я лично больше люблю играть с друзьями как раз ПРОТИВ маньяка (просто потому что часто с кнопками не справляюсь хехех)

Best horror muliplayer survival game on the market
игра для релакса и веселья с друзьями

Punto de vista de Survi:
En tus primeras horas te escondés en los arbustos de un señor que te quiere matar, le tenés miedo a ese asesino que ronda por el mapa. Pasada las 100hs ya le empezás a perder el respeto a ese señor, te le mostrás porque querés loopear con él, ser perseguido, hacer que coma madera y que quede ciego a causa de un linternazo. En otras palabras, intentar hacerle bullying al pobre hombre... excepto que sea una nurse buena, ahí te vas a una esquina a llorar, o al piso, porque ahí es donde vas a vivir toda la partida.

Punto de vista del Killer:
Sos un asesino, un desalmado que su única tarea es hacer que los pobre supervivientes que hay en la zona sufran, tengan miedo, clavarle un gancho en el hombro y que se mueran desangrados. Bueno, sí todo muy lindo hasta que te aparece una premade de 3000hs que te hacen comer madera, te dejan ciego y que parece que corren más rápido que vos.

Bueno ahora sí, te lo recomiendo? Sí. Pero no creas que va a ser un juego de terror, si te vas a pegar tus buenos soretes cuando te aparezca un asesino de la nada en la cara, pero no es que la vas a pasar asustado. Es un juego que con amigos lo vas a disfrutar mucho más, pero aún así se puede jugar solo y podés pasarla bien, los devs lo mantienen bastante vivo con actualizaciones y escuchan a su comunidad e intentan manterla contenta (obvio que no se puede hacer feliz a todos, la gente siempre se va a quejar).
Conclusión, si te interesa un juego de aprender a correr de un asesino, usando estructuras para hacer el mayor tiempo posible para que tus compañeros hagan motores y escapar, o hacer full m1 en el motor para escapar y esconderte siempre que viene el killer (también es válido.) y de parte de killer correr a supervivientes, colgarlos y matarlos, intentando mejorar para que no se te escape nadie.. o aprender a jugar nurse y mandarlos al lobby. Este es tu juego.

하루종일 버그가 난무하고 매칭도 엿같이 잡히는 개병신게임 살인마하면 상대 생존자들 다 고인물로 매칭시키고 생존자하면 매크로 만나서 랭크올린 물랭들 신생아들이랑 매칭되서 허구한 날 올킬당하는 개좆망게임 생존자로 보랭가는게 이렇게나 힘들다니 시발 어그로 존나 못끌어서 터널링당하는 새끼도 보랭인 판에 왜 나는 보랭을 못가냐 나는 항상 밥값은 하면서 열심히 발전기 돌리고 열심히 달리는데 시발 진짜 생존자로 하면 팀운좆망겜이고 살인마로 돌리면 매칭좆망겜 아 생존자로 해도 매칭좆망겜이구나 그냥 매칭시스템부터 병신같은 개망겜 근데도 보랭켠왕을 하는 내가 병신같다 시발 하긴 디렉터부터가 개병신새낀데 게임도 개병신같이 만들었겠지 시발
